abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New York Islanders, 3-0; other hockey scores noted.
snippet: The Islanders and Penguins, who racked up an astonishing 346 penalty minutes in a meeting last season, did not fight Tuesday in Pittsburgh’s shutout victory.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders and Penguins, who racked up an astonishing 346 penalty minutes in a meeting last season, did not fight Tuesday in Pittsburgh’s shutout victory.

headline.main: Islanders, Looking for a Win and Not a Fight, Get Neither
headline.print_headline: Islanders, Looking for a Win and Not a Fight, Get Neither
headline.seo: Penguins Shut Out Islanders, Who Loss Their Third Straight
